mapper.select: SELECT t1.MODULE_ID moduleId, t1.MODULE_NAME moduleName, t1.MODULE_DESC moduleDesc, t1.MODULE_TYPE moduleType, t1.PARENT parent, t1.MODULE_URL moduleUrl, t1.I_LEVEL level, t1.ENABLE enable, t1.PRIORITY priority FROM sys_modules_t t1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_users_t t2, sys_users_roles_t t3, sys_roles_t t4, sys_roles_moudles_t t5 WHERE t2.USER_ID = t3.USER_ID AND t3.ROLE_ID = t4.ROLE_ID AND t4.ROLE_ID = t5.ROLE_ID AND t2.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND t2.ENABLED = 1 AND t4.ENABLE = 1 and t2.is_del = 0 and t4.is_del = 0 AND t5.MODULE_ID = t1.MODULE_ID) AND t1.PARENT = #{moduleId} AND t1.ENABLE = 1 AND T1.IS_DEL = 0 ORDER BY t1.PRIORITY, t1.CREATE_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) count FROM SYS_MODULES_T T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_modules_t (MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, MODULE_DESC, MODULE_TYPE, PARENT, MODULE_URL, I_LEVEL, ENABLE, PRIORITY, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATER, IS_DEL) VALUES (UPPER(REPLACE(UUID(),'-','')), #{moduleName}, #{moduleDesc}, ${moduleType}, #{parent}, #{moduleUrl}, (select i_level+1 from sys_modules_t tt where tt.module_Id = #{parent}), ${enable}, ${priority}, NOW(), #{creator}, NOW(), #{creator}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_MODULES_T SET MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName}, MODULE_DESC = #{moduleDesc}, MODULE_TYPE = ${moduleType}, PARENT = #{parent}, MODULE_URL = #{moduleUrl}, I_LEVEL = ${level}, ENABLE = ${enable}, PRIORITY = ${priority}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), LAST_UPDATER = #{creator} WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}
